title: Herald Sun Occupation
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Newspapers
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Newspaper publishing - Australia
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/News agencies
abstract: Protests at Herald Sun offices during World Economic Forum
description: During the World Economic Forum (WEF) held in Melbourne in September 2000, a group of protesters went to the Herald Sun newspaper to voice their concern the paper's exceptionally biased coverage of the protests outside the WEF. Screened as a news story for SKA TV's Access News, a grass-roots alternative to mainstream news and current affairs, broadcast weekly on Melbourne's Community Television station Channel 31 since 1994.
